title: Subject-template template schema
description: Subject-template template schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56

propertyDescriptions.subject-general-element: Metadata relating to the subject of the experiment.
propertyDescriptions.subject-training-element: Information on training of the animal.
propertyDescriptions.subject-surgery-element: Information on surgeries performed on of the animal.

items.title: subject-general-element field schema
items.description: subject-general-element field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56

propertyDescriptions.genotypic sex: Sex of the subject being defined.
propertyDescriptions.subjectSpecies: Binomial species name from NCBI taxonomy
propertyDescriptions.subejctSpeciesStrain: String value indicating the strain of the species, for example: C57BL/6J.
propertyDescriptions.subjectSpeciesStrainRRID: Research resource identifier (RRID) of the strain of the species.
propertyDescriptions.subjectAbbreviatedID: Abbreviated identifier of the subject, for instance, identifier used in file names.
propertyDescriptions.subjectBirthDate: Birthdate of the subject, if available.
propertyDescriptions.subjectAge: Age of the participant at time of begining of recording (first data point recorded) in years.
propertyDescriptions.subjectCharacter: Remarks on the general characteristics of the subject, if any.
